entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 4.5°C

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Temperature steady near 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning this evening. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 7. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Thursday 09 February 2023
